meaningMnemonic: On the <radical>ground</radical> is a <radical>water</radical> <radical>drop</radical> you spilled, so I <kanji>request</kanji> you wipe it up. I would do it myself, but you're the one who spilled it, so I'm requesting you do it and take responsibility for your mistake.
readingMnemonic: Oh, one more thing. I <kanji>request</kanji> that you wipe up the water with this <reading>cu</reading>cumber (きゅう).
